SELECT id, name, start_date AS startDate, end_date AS endDate, status, remark FROM studentms.term WHERE name = #{name} LIMIT 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO studentms.term (name, start_date, end_date, status, remark) VALUES (#{name}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{status}, #{remark})
mapper.update: UPDATE studentms.term SET name = #{name}, start_date = #{startDate}, end_date = #{endDate}, status = #{status}, remark = #{remark} WHERE id = #{id}
